data.title: Charles Mann, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Charles Mann stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Charles Mann - Points

Charles Mann scores a career high 29 points (2014)

On March 19, 2014, Charles Mann set his career high in points in a NCAA game. That day he scored 29 points in Georgia Bulldogs's home win against Vermont Catamounts, 63-56. He also had 5 rebounds, 3 assists, 1 steal. He shot 7/8 from two, 1/3 from three, shooting at 72.7% from the field. He also shot 12/13 from the free-throw line.

Charles Mann - Rebounds

Charles Mann grabs a career high 10 rebounds (2014)

On March 08, 2014, Charles Mann tied his career high in rebounds in a NCAA game. That day he grabbed 10 rebounds in Georgia Bulldogs's road win against LSU Tigers, 61-69. He also had 22 points, 2 assists, 1 steal.

Charles Mann - Assists

Charles Mann gives a career high 9 assists (2017)

On March 31, 2017, Charles Mann set his career high in assists in a Canada - NBL game. That day he dished 9 assists in Cape Breton H.'s home win against Moncton, 119-110. He also had 17 points, 4 rebounds.

Charles Mann - Steals

Charles Mann has a career high 4 steals (2015)

On November 13, 2015, Charles Mann tied his career high in steals in a NCAA game. That day he reached 4 steals in Georgia Bulldogs's home loss against Chattanooga Mocs, 90-92. He also had 17 points, 7 rebounds and 3 assists.

Charles Mann - Blocks

Charles Mann blocks a career high 1 shot (2017)

On February 04, 2017, Charles Mann tied his career high in blocks in a Canada - NBL game. That day he went for 1 block in Cape Breton H.'s road loss against The Island Storm, 112-95. He also had 20 points, 8 rebounds and 8 assists.

Charles Mann - Efficiency

Charles Mann records a career high 27 efficiency rating (2014)

On March 19, 2014, Charles Mann set his career high in efficiency in a NCAA game. That day he accomplished 27 efficiency in Georgia Bulldogs's home win against Vermont Catamounts, 63-56. He also had 29 points, 5 rebounds and 3 assists.
